results.title: Metformin as a new option in the medical management of breast fibroadenoma; a randomized clinical trial
results.text_hl: The most important positive findings can be briefly interpreted as: (1) Significant enlargement was less probable in @<m>DISEASE_Dianzani_autoimmune_lymphoproliferative_syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C535950 @@@FAs@@@ under @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@MF@@@ treatment. (2) In @SPECIES_9606 @@@women@@@ with multiple @<m>DISEASE_Dianzani_autoimmune_lymphoproliferative_syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C535950 @@@FAs@@@, MF increased more than four-fold the probability of a safe course for all the masses of a @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ by decreasing the chance for significant enlargement. (3) FAs under @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@MF@@@ treatment had a two-fold size decrement compared with those under placebo. (4) For the largest @DISEASE_Fibroadenoma @DISEASE_MESH:D018226 @@@FA@@@ of each @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@, size reduction was more frequent and enlargement was less frequent with MF than with placebo. (5) @SPECIES_9606 @@@Women@@@ receiving @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@MF@@@ had experienced a two-fold regression of FA size in comparison with the placebo group in all @DISEASE_Fibroadenoma @DISEASE_MESH:D018226 @@@fibroadenoma@@@. (6) The rate of disappearance of @<m>DISEASE_Dianzani_autoimmune_lymphoproliferative_syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C535950 @@@FAs@@@ was higher in largest and smallest @DISEASE_Fibroadenoma @DISEASE_MESH:D018226 @@@fibroadenoma@@@ under @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@MF@@@ treatment in @SPECIES_9606 @@@women@@@ with multiple lesions.
